entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Bancroft
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:12 p.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing rain or ice pellets overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets changing to periods of rain in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Local rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Temperature rising to 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Showers ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening and after midnight. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Temperature rising to 9 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. High 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
